thread.title: Kim Kardashian Wishes Paris Hilton Happy Birthday with a Photo Of Herself
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian Wishes Paris Hilton Happy Birthday with a Photo Of Herself

author: Erica Gonzales
title: Kim Kardashian Wishes Paris Hilton Happy Birthday with a Photo Of Herself
text:
Kim Kardashian, like most of us, is guilty of posting shoutouts for her friends on their birthdays. The social media star did just that this afternoon for her old friend Paris Hilton, who turns 36 today. "Happy Birthday Paris Hilton!" she captioned a black and white photo on Snapchat. It's a short and sweet message, except the photo is Kardashian's mirror selfie in a dressing room, and Hilton isn't in the shot at all.
Kim Kardashian / Snapchat However, Kim is sporting new bleach-blonde hair (like Paris') and a crystal-encrusted choker, much like the one Hilton wore for her iconic 21st birthday outfit (which Kim's younger sister Kendall paid homage to last year ). Perhaps the photo is a bigger tribute than meets the eye.
This isn't the first time Kim has trolled her friends with birthday posts. In September, she pulled off the same move when she greeted her assistant Stephanie Sheppard with a picture of herself.
